function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges to the validity of social science energy research presented by the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Risk of decreased validity of energy social science research","Mitigation":"Implement principles for data collection, reporting of study conditions, and study design considerations to ensure high validity","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers in the field of energy social science","Owner":"Researchers in the field of energy social science"},{"Description":"Difficulty in prioritizing and justifying measures to account for potential pandemic-related influences","Impact":"Risk of inadequate consideration of pandemic-related influences on research","Mitigation":"Implement a 'core and consider' approach to prioritize and justify measures to account for potential pandemic-related influences","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers in the field of energy social science","Owner":"Researchers in the field of energy social science"},{"Description":"Constraints such as research plans, budgets, timelines, and labor constraints affecting the ability to address validity challenges","Impact":"Risk of inadequate response to validity challenges due to constraints","Mitigation":"Ensure that responses to validity challenges are proportionate to the vulnerability and fit within existing research plans, budgets, and timelines","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers in the field of energy social science","Owner":"Researchers in the field of energy social science"}]}
